propositions.text: The document contains information about Chapter 750.
The female official is smiling discreetly.
The female official is addressing someone named 'Zhi'.
The female official indicates that it is almost ten o'clock and they need to rest.
The female official asks if a task has been completed.
A plan was initiated a week prior.
The plan involves identifying who it is for.
The plan involves identifying what items are needed.
The current moment is described as 'just the beginning' of the plan's execution.
Someone is questioning the nature of the plan.
The question is whether the plan is 'just a plan'.
The response to the question is 'Mm'.
The questioner reiterates their doubt about the plan.
The reiteration uses repeated interrogative phrases ('what, what, you what').
The response to the reiterated question is also 'Mm'.

concepts.name: Plan
concepts.context: The concept of a 'plan' is central to the dialogue, with questions about its nature and execution.

concepts.name: Time
concepts.context: Refers to both a specific timestamp and the general concept of time in relation to resting.

concepts.name: Rest
concepts.context: Indicates the need to cease activity due to the time.

concepts.name: Execution
concepts.context: Implied by 'just the beginning' of the plan.

concepts.name: Doubt
concepts.context: Expressed through repeated questioning about the plan.

hierarchy.structure: The document is structured with a main title, followed by a 'Table of Contents' (符录) section which contains a specific entry (符录一) that includes chapter information and the beginning of narrative text. The narrative text primarily consists of a dialogue between a female official and another person, discussing a plan.
